room_title: Escape room "Secrets of the Abandoned Circus" by International Quests Escape Rooms in Philadelphia
review: We went on Saturday night with bunch of my friends ( group of 7) and had an Amazing time! That was our first Escape Room experience and rooms is definitely very challenging but Fun! Great story line and very creative room design it really takes you the the Old Circus atmosphere...The staff was extremely nice and friendly:)Highly Recommend

room_title: Escape room "Secrets of the Abandoned Circus" by International Quests Escape Rooms in Philadelphia
review: We had a great time in the Abandoned Circus escape room! The d√©cor was very detailed and the puzzles were challenging. Can't wait to go back to the Tesla's Mystery room!

room_title: Escape room "Secrets of the Abandoned Circus" by International Quests Escape Rooms in Philadelphia
review: Tried the "Secrets of the Circus" room with wife and son, and got teamed up with other guests ... very challenging but tons of fun. Would highly recommend!
